name: Chocolate Sugar Drop Cookies
author: Jamie7
summary: My daughter and I had fun experimenting in the kitchen one night creating our own recipe.
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Mix sugar, butter, egg, and vanilla together in a large bowl
Mix flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt in a small bowl
Beat flour mixture into sugar mixture slowly until well-combined, about 2 minutes
Stir chocolate chips into cookie dough
Spoon cookie dough onto the baking sheet, spaced about 2-inches apart
Bake in the preheated oven until edges are crisp, 10 to 12 minutes
Cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely
